metadata.name: Escape From Neighborhood
metadata.description: Smokin Alien sits alone in his room, and the smoke from his cigarette rises slowly. He takes off into space using the power of his imagination and starts exploring new planets with his spaceship in his imagination. He discovers that each planet is unique and special, and he eagerly wants to uncover each one's mysterious history. Smokin Alien is eager and excited to make his imagined discoveries a reality. He continues exploring the planets in his imagination, disappearing into the smoke from his cigarette like his spaceship.
